author: aryanXmahajan
text:
HOLY SH*T... Look at this.

STEAL these 4 AI agents that replace your $250K-$500K marketing team

probably shouldn't be sharing these for free...

– n8n AI Content Spy (scrapes 6 platforms, generates viral scripts in 7 minutes)
– MCP Context Extractor (instant competitor analysis in 30 seconds)
– Psychology Ad Engine (creates scroll-stopping ads using behavioral triggers)
– AI Content Clone (learns your writing style, generates viral ideas)
– Complete n8n workflow templates (plug-and-play automation)
– Remote MCP servers (zero setup, runs on our infrastructure)

ZERO manual work
ZERO expensive agencies
ZERO technical skills needed

basically everything you need to make money with AI in 2025

all plug-and-play

Like + comment “STEAL” + repost (must be following so I can DM you)
